00003 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00004 // Name: CreateFFmpeg()
00005 // Desc: DLL API for creating an instance of FFmpeg
00006 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00007  EXTERN_FUNC IFFmpeg* __cdecl CreateFFmpeg()
00008 {
00009         return CheckFFmpegSupport(NULL) ? new FFmpeg() : NULL;
00010 }
00011 
00012 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00013 // Name: CheckFFmpegSupport()
00014 // Desc: DLL API for checking support for FFmpeg on the target system
00015 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00016  EXTERN_FUNC bool __cdecl CheckFFmpegSupport(LPTSTR* missingdllname)
00017 {
00018         if(!Engine::FindDLL("avcodec-52.dll", missingdllname))
00019                 return false;
00020         if(!Engine::FindDLL("avformat-52.dll", missingdllname))
00021                 return false;
00022         if(!Engine::FindDLL("avutil-50.dll", missingdllname))
00023                 return false;
00024         if(!Engine::FindDLL("swscale-0.dll", missingdllname))
00025                 return false;
00026 
00027    return true;
00028 }

00044 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 // Name: LoadFile()
00046 // Desc: Load audio and/or video file, extract streams and load codecs
00047 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 Result FFmpeg::LoadFile(FilePath path, IMediaFile** file)
00049 {
00050         MediaFile* newfile;
00051         Result rlt;
00052 
00053         CHKALLOC(*file = newfile = new MediaFile());
00054         IFFAILED(newfile->Load(path))
00055         {
00056                 RELEASE(newfile);
00057                 return rlt;
00058         }
00059 
00060         CHKALLOC(files = (MediaFile**)realloc(files, (numfiles + 1) * sizeof(MediaFile*)));
00061         files[numfiles++] = newfile;
00062 
00063         return R_OK;
00064 }

00066 #pragma region BlitToWnd
00067 HDC hdc = NULL, hmemDC = NULL;
00068 HBITMAP hmemBMP = NULL;
00069 BITMAPINFO bmpinfo;
00070 Rect<int> bltdestrect;
00071 
00072 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00073 // Name: PrepareBlittingToWnd()
00074 // Desc: Create a backbuffer for later calls to BlitToWnd
00075 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 Result FFmpeg::PrepareBlittingToWnd(HWND wndtarget, const Rect<int>* destrect) //EDIT: Optimize and clean up
00077 {
00078         bltdestrect = Rect<int>(*destrect);
00079 
00080         RECT rect;
00081         GetClientRect(wndtarget, &rect);
00082         int width = rect.right - rect.left;
00083         int height = rect.bottom - rect.top;
00084 
00085         ZeroMemory(&bmpinfo, sizeof(BITMAPINFO));
00086         bmpinfo.bmiHeader.biSize = sizeof(BITMAPINFOHEADER);
00087         bmpinfo.bmiHeader.biWidth = destrect->width;
00088         bmpinfo.bmiHeader.biHeight = destrect->height;
00089         bmpinfo.bmiHeader.biPlanes = 1;
00090         bmpinfo.bmiHeader.biBitCount = 24;
00091         bmpinfo.bmiHeader.biCompression = BI_RGB;
00092         bmpinfo.bmiHeader.biSizeImage = destrect->width * destrect->height * 3;
00093 
00094         // Get display DC
00095         hdc = GetDC(wndtarget);
00096 
00097         // Create backbuffer bitmap
00098         hmemBMP = CreateCompatibleBitmap(hdc, destrect->width, destrect->height);
00099 
00100         // Create off-screen DC compatible to displays DC
00101         hmemDC = CreateCompatibleDC(hdc);
00102 
00103         return R_OK;
00104 }
00105 
00106 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 // Name: BlitToWnd()
00108 // Desc: Helper function for copying 24 bit RGB frame data into the target window
00109 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00110 void FFmpeg::BlitToWnd(uint8_t* framedata) //EDIT: Optimize and clean up
00111 {
00112         // Select backbuffer into off-screen DC
00113         HGDIOBJ hobjOld = SelectObject(hmemDC, hmemBMP);
00114 
00115         // Draw onto backbuffer
00116         SetDIBits(hmemDC, hmemBMP, 0, bltdestrect.height, framedata, &bmpinfo, DIB_RGB_COLORS);
00117 
00118         // Blit backbuffer to screen
00119         StretchBlt(hdc, bltdestrect.x, bltdestrect.y + bltdestrect.height - 1, bltdestrect.width, -bltdestrect.height,
00120                            hmemDC, 0, 0, bltdestrect.width, bltdestrect.height, SRCCOPY);
00121 
00122         // Restore previous GDI object
00123         SelectObject(hmemDC, hobjOld);
00124 }
00125 
00126 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 // Name: EndBlittingToWnd()
00128 // Desc: Free backbuffer and DCs
00129 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00130 void FFmpeg::EndBlittingToWnd() //EDIT: Optimize and clean up
00131 {
00132         // Clean up
00133         DeleteObject(hmemBMP);
00134         DeleteDC(hmemDC);
00135         DeleteDC(hdc);
00136 }
00137 #pragma endregion

00139 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00140 // Name: Release()
00141 // Desc: Destructor replacement (destructors can't be overloaded)
00142 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00143 void FFmpeg::Release()
00144 {
00145         for(UINT i = 0; i < numfiles; i++)
00146                 RELEASE(files[i])
00147         REMOVE_ARRAY(files)
00148         numfiles = 0;
00149 
00150         delete this;
00151 }
